doc.title: Los Angeles/Gang Bang
doc.plot: Shocking documentary about the homeless problem, the drug problem and the gang problem in Los Angeles. The section about the homeless problem gives interviews and comments by homeless people from Los Angeles and social workers. The section about the drug problem shows interviews with crack addicts and former users. It also shows how to buy and make the drug. The section about the gang problem shows interviews with gang members and their families. Together with police officers, the crew enters gang territories at night and looks at gang conflicts
